channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows 10 Version 2004 for x64-based Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows 10 Version 2004 for x64-based Systems

item.title: CVE-2020-1242|2024-08-04T06:31:59.919Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%2010%20version%202004%20for%20x64-based%20systems
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Edge handles cross-origin requests, aka 'Microsoft Edge Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.
